Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored a buzzer-beating three-point shot to end the first half
Steph Curry scored 15 points in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Steph Curry played under restricted minutes but still came out as Golden State’s best player
Others: Golden State Warriors notched their fourth consecutive victory and second straight on the road
Buddy Hield once again proved why he’s the second option for Golden State
Four other Warriors players were in double-scoring figures
